meanings.definition: The act of consuming more than is needed or desired.
meanings.sent1: Overconsumption of snacks can lead to health problems.
meanings.sent2: The overconsumption of water during the hike caused him to feel sick.
meanings.sent3: The party had so much food that overconsumption was inevitable.
meanings.sent4: Her overconsumption of novels made her the bookworm of the family.
meanings.sent5: The overconsumption of electricity in the house led to a high utility bill.

meanings.definition: Excessive consumption of goods or resources.
meanings.sent1: Overconsumption of clothes can result in a cluttered wardrobe.
meanings.sent2: The overconsumption of fossil fuels is harmful to the environment.
meanings.sent3: His overconsumption of gadgets made him the tech guru among his friends.
meanings.sent4: The overconsumption of information on social media can be overwhelming.
meanings.sent5: The overconsumption of plastic bags is damaging to marine life.
